Summary.Description: Objects that will be created on the target YugabyteDB.

DatabaseObjects.ObjectNames: public.agent_statuses, public.agents, public.countries, public.expenses, public.expensive_items, public.gear_names, public.points, public.reports, public.secret_missions
reports_attrs_idx ON public.reports, reports_report_idx ON public.reports
DatabaseObjects.Details: There are some GIN indexes present in the schema, but GIN indexes are partially supported in YugabyteDB as mentioned in (https://github.com/yugabyte/yugabyte-db/issues/7850) so take a look and modify them if not supported.

Issues.Reason: HSTORE datatype not yet supported by voyager in live migration with fall-forward/fallback. Affected column: attrs. These columns will be excluded when exporting and importing data in live migration workflows.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE TABLE public.reports (agent_uuid uuid, "time" timestamp with time zone, attrs public.hstore DEFAULT (''::public.hstore), report text, report_tsv tsvector)CREATE TABLE public.t (i int NOT NULL, ts timestamp (0) with time zone DEFAULT now(), j pg_catalog.json, t text, e public.myenum, c public.mycomposit, CONSTRAINT t_pkey PRIMARY KEY (i)) WITH (colocation=false) WITH (colocation=false);

Issues.Reason: Exclusion constraints are not yet supported in YugabyteDB.
Issues.SqlStatement: ALTER TABLE ONLY public.secret_missions ADD CONSTRAINT cnt_solo_agent EXCLUDE USING gist (location WITH =, mission_timeline WITH &&);

Issues.Reason: TSVECTOR datatype not yet supported by voyager in live migration with fall-forward/fallback. Affected column: report_tsv. These columns will be excluded when exporting and importing data in live migration workflows.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE TABLE public.reports (agent_uuid uuid, "time" timestamp with time zone, attrs public.hstore DEFAULT (''::public.hstore), report text, report_tsv tsvector) WITH (colocation=false);
